Module org.omnifaces
Package org.omnifaces.component.input.componentidparam

Class ConditionalWriterListener

java.lang.Object
org.omnifaces.component.input.componentidparam.ConditionalWriterListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhaseListener, Serializable, EventListener
public class ConditionalWriterListener extends Object implements PhaseListener
PhaseListener intended to work in conjunction with the ComponentIdParam component.

This installs a ResponseWriter that only renders specific components.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Arjan Tijms
